• The Weekend
  • Getting to Wahsoune

Getting to

Wahsoune

We will be arranging boat pickup from the Moon River Marine, where you can park your car. There is a parking lot to the right of the Marina that is cheaper than buying a pass at the Marina itself.

It takes about 8 hours to get to Moon River Marine from Montréal (with enough time for a bite to eat and an ice cream stop), and the boat ride to Wahsoune is about 20 more minutes. As it's a pretty big trip, we would suggest coming up in groups if possible!

Directions to Moon River Marine

Boat schedule

Please choose a pickup time slot below. We can only fit about 10 people on the boat at the same time. Please try to respect your arrival time.

I can't make these times :( Let us know!

Getting back

On Sunday and Monday we’ll have a couple boat trips going back to the Marina so you can be on your merry way!

Checklist

  • Choose a time slot at the Marina
  • Plan your drive up. We suggest going through Ottawa if you’re coming from Montreal
  • Pack your bags, fishing gear, and comfy cottage clothes
  • On your drive up, MacTier is your last stop for food and alcohol before the Marina
  • We’ll be there to pick you up!

September 1, 2018
